nl_question: What genes are associated with hereditary breast carcinoma?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:Gene)-[r:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]->(d:Disorder {displayName: 'hereditary breast carcinoma'}) WHERE r.scoreOpenTargets IS NULL OR r.scoreOpenTargets > 0.3 RETURN g.displayName AS GeneName

nl_question: What is the primary domain ID for cystic fibrosis?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Disorder {displayName: 'cystic fibrosis'}) RETURN d.primaryDomainId AS PrimaryDomainID

nl_question: What are the data sources for the disorder information on Li-Fraumeni syndrome?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Disorder {displayName: 'Li-Fraumeni syndrome'}) RETURN d.dataSources AS DataSources

nl_question: What are the ICD10 codes associated with Wilson disease?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Disorder {displayName: 'Wilson disease'}) RETURN d.icd10 AS ICD10Codes

nl_question: What are the clinical descriptions for the phenotypes associated with ataxia telangiectasia?
cypher_translation: MATCH (dis:Disorder {displayName: 'ataxia telangiectasia'})-[:DisorderHasPhenotype]->(ph:Phenotype) RETURN ph.primaryDomainId AS phenotypeId, ph.displayName AS phenotypeName, ph.description AS phenotypeDescription

nl_question: What are the known subtypes of the 'neoplasm' disorder?
List the phenotypes commonly observed in individuals diagnosed with 'cystic fibrosis'.
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Phenotype)<-[:DisorderHasPhenotype]-(d:Disorder {displayName: 'cystic fibrosis'}) RETURN p.displayName AS Phenotype

nl_question: What drugs have an indication for the treatment of 'type 2 diabetes mellitus'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Drug)-[:DrugHasIndication]->(di:Disorder {displayName: 'type 2 diabetes mellitus'}) RETURN d.displayName AS DrugName

nl_question: Are there any specific genomic variants known to be associated with 'Alzheimer disease'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (v:GenomicVariant)-[:VariantAssociatedWithDisorder]->(d:Disorder {displayName: 'Alzheimer disease'}) RETURN v.primaryDomainId AS GenomicVariantName

nl_question: What is the description and ICD-10 code for 'Alzheimer disease'?
Which phenotypes are associated with 'type 2 diabetes mellitus'?
What disorders are classified as subtypes of 'neoplasm'?
What drugs are indicated for treating 'COVID-19'?
